name: 2018 10th International Conference on Information Management and Engineering (ICIME 2018)--SCOPUS, Ei Compendex
content: Publication: All the registered and presented papers will be published in volume of conference proceeding; which will be indexed by SCOPUS, Ei Compendex,etc. ++ Submission Methods: Full Paper(publication and oral presentation) Abstract(oral presentation only) Electronic Submission System (.pdf) https://www.easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icime2018 ++ Contacts: Ms. Jessi Mars Telephone: +1-661-888-4278; +852-30623054 E-mail: icime@iact.net
